extendedInfo.description: Access your phone from text messages (SMS)!Have you forgotten your phone at home and want to see incoming calls or just search a phone number in your contact list?Have you lost your phone, and want to locate it or simply make it ring as you left it in silent mode?Or maybe you want to remotely read your received text messages? This application is made for you!Below are the commands that can be executed:-Contact search-Location-Get the received SMS-Get the calls log-Ring-Vibrate-Make a call-Run an application-Airplane mode-Get the battery state-Turn the wifi on/off-taking picture and send by email-record audio and send by emailEverything is secured, since you can create profiles for specific phone numbers and grant them (or not) rights. There is also a public access (that you can enable or not) to grant rights to any phone.The application can work in silent mode or not. If so, all the texts processed by the app, won't be notified nor appear in the sms box.Two ways to execute the commands :-either in the interactive menu (just send the defined password by sms and follow the instructions).-or by sending directly the command name (preceed by the password. The command will be executed only if the phone number have the required rights).Please feel free to email us if you have remarks or suggestions, we'll do our best to answer you quickly!tags: sms, commands, command, commander, remote, execute, spy, text messages

reviews.title: very nice app , small glitch in airplane command
reviews.comment: I installed on my sony mini pro (android v2.3) and it is working great. There is one minor problem in airplane command. After sending a airplane command it immediately places the mobile in airplane mode so the mobile doesnt get an opportunity to relay the sms received status back to the mobile service provider. As a result , once you quit airplane mode , the service provider would resend the previous sms , resulting in this app placing the mobile again in airplane mode. This would be a continuous loop. Only way to come out of it is to disable the airplane command temporarily in the app. One more minor issue is there is no way to stop the ringer after placing the phone in ring mode. Otherwise all other features are working perfectly. If i ask for a new feature is to enable 2G/3G data similar to wifi on/off feature. Thanks for this wonderful app. well deserved 5 Star.
reviews.author: Sudhir Shetty

reviews.title: Awesome app but small problem!
reviews.comment: This app is visible in launcher, so if someone stole my phone then they could factory reset my phone and then it wont work for me cuz it would be uninstalled! tried installing as a system app but its installed at /data/app in a zip archive so i cant do that. Useless to me b/c of that. If i can install as a system app then i will re download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Devs do not reply on the paid side!  Be careful! Don\'t buy abandoned APPS!
reviews.author: Daniel Chapa
